A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A garbled mess\, it was like being stuck in Kylo Rens head with no point or fist-pumping moments.  Luke's character was misused\, Leia's character was wholly unnecessary\, Poe was \"poe\"larized and Fin was..well Fin.  We don't visit a lot of planets which is typically a mainstay in these trilogies and our expected \"cantina scene\" was tired at best.  Wait for the DVD or Digital release there is really nothing that can be spoiled here as truly nothing happened.
